snippet: New Zealand, where the director Peter Jackson made the "Lord of the Rings'' trilogy and two new "Hobbit'' films, is looking to attract more film productions and even some television work.
abstract: New Zealand, where the director Peter Jackson made the "Lord of the Rings'' trilogy and two new "Hobbit'' films, is looking to attract more film productions and even some television work.

headline.main: New Zealand Prime Minister Makes Sales Pitch to Hollywood
